mdRecord.dcterms:title: A view of Col. Johnson's engagement with the savages (Commanded by Tecumseh) near the Moravian Town, October 5th 1812 [i.e. 1813]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Depiction of the Battle of the Thames, in which Tecumseh was killed: Col. Johnson, mounted, fights with an unmounted Indian; unmounted American and Indian engage in hand-to-hand combat; Indian attempts to scalp a soldier; Tecumseh trys to rally his men, while American infantrymen and cavalry pursue the Indians in the background.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 print : hand colored ; image 16 x 34 cm. on sheet 20 x 37 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Thames, Battle of the, Ont., 1813
History
Tecumseh/
Johnson, Richard M. (Richard Mentor)
